segments.text: I'm not feeling too well . I've caught a cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it because of the bad weather ? It's been really miserable for the past tew days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hasn't it ! It's been cold and windy recently.Do you like the weather here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really , but I've got used to it now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm going for a trip to New York this autumn . What's the weather like in New York ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not quite good . It's windy and dry . We have got continental climate there . It's dry all the year round . Usually autumn is the best season of the year In New York .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it cold in autumn there ? Should I take any warm clothes with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it isn't very cold at that time . You'll only need some light wool clothing with somejackets and shirts .
segments.speaker: S1
